name: Sally Reid

jv_history.partner_name: Sally Reid - Retired but open to God's will and plan | LinkedIn
jv_history.source_quote:
Sally Reid

Retired but open to God's will and plan

Portland, Oregon Metropolitan Area (US) ... Seeking to collaborate with others who have gone through a transformation in their life. Seeking those

what_you_do: Energetic alignment expert and intuitive channel who helps highly sensitive, high-functioning individuals stop managing their growth and start living from what's real through grounded clarity, deep energetic precision, and work with The Council of Truth.
who_you_serve: High-capacity, energetically perceptive women and highly sensitive professionals who've done the healing work but still feel off.
seeking: Podcast, event, interview, speaking engagements, and collaborations.
offering: Private coaching and healing sessions, courses for working with sensitivity, media and speaking appearances.
social_proof: 15+ years of deep 1:1 work, two near-death experiences informing her practice.
business_focus: Helping highly sensitive, high-capacity individuals restore coherence through energy, language, and nervous system alignment.
service_provided: Private coaching and healing sessions, clarity and nervous system alignment sessions, online courses, speaking engagements
